text: Shobaraj is an Indian film actor in the Kannada film industry. Some of his notable films include Yajamana (2000), Shabdavedhi (2000), Police Story (1996), and Sangliyana Part-3 (1997). ==Career== Shobaraj has been part of more than 250 Kannada films. ==Selected filmography== ;Kannada * Kranthiveera Sangolli Rayanna (2012)...Bhandari Babu * Sri Chowdeshwari Devi Mahime (2012) * Police Story (2007) * Ayya (2005) * Varsha (2005) * Valmiki (2005)...Desai * Deadly Soma (2005)...Babaraj * Suntaragaali (2006) * Deadly Soma (2005) * Swamy (2005)...Paramashiva * Mourya (2004) * Hrudayavantha (2003) *Simhadriya Simha (2002) *Baava Baamaida (2001) *Galate Aliyandru (2000) *Snehaloka (1999) *Police Story (1996) *Bangarada Kalasha (1995) *Lockup Death (1994) *Golibar (1993) *Chaitrada Premanjali (1990) ;Tamil *Jai Surya (2004) *Veerappu (2007) *Machakaaran (2007) *Sandhithathum Sindhithathum (2013) ==See also== *List of people from Karnataka *Cinema of Karnataka *Cinema of Tamil Nadu *List of Indian film actors *Cinema of India ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Male actors in Tamil cinema Category:Male actors in Kannada cinema Category:Indian male film actors Category:Male actors from Karnataka Category:20th-century Indian male actors Category:21st-century Indian male actors Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Shobaraj (actor)
